title: @Riot Are your servers experiencing problems?
body: Since a series of storms several days ago, my ping has been oddly high while playing League. ~400 average. And it's regular any other time. Can someone help here?

replies.body:
It sounds like the storm may have caused some network infrastructure problems that have affected your ISP routing to the server. The servers aren't experiencing any issues, so I recommend first ensuring your network setup is up to spec using our [network guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) before we investigate further.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your connection.
